title: Discord and connecting to games.
body:
Just as the title says, I am able to log into the client, chat with friends, create game lobbies and join queue, but I CANNOT connect to any game mode once champion select is over.
I did go into a game once after restarting the client a few times but it just left me in the game and wouldn't go any further, nothing showed up but the announcer kept talking as if the game was going on.

Thanks for reading and any help is appreciated.

replies.body:
It seems like your network is having a problem specifically connecting to the game server.  You should go through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help strengthen your network and get in.  

As an added supplement, I also recommend downloading the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367).  There is an option there to configure your firewall just in case that may be blocking your connection.  

Let me know if you have any questions!
